scripts.build:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:benchmarks && npm run build:tests
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:core && npm run clean:benchmarks && run clean:tests
scripts.clean:benchmarks: cd ./benchmarks/MyApp.Benchmarks/ && dotnet clean && rm -rf obj/ bin/
scripts.clean:core: cd ./src/MyApp && dotnet clean && rm -rf obj/ bin/
scripts.clean:tests: cd ./tests/MyApp.Tests/ && dotnet clean && rm -rf obj/ bin/
